description: Removes the specified set of tags from an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain, data source, or application. For more information, see Tagging Amazon OpenSearch Service resources.

parameters.name: ARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain, data source, or application from which you want to delete the specified tags.

parameters.name: TagKeys
parameters.description: The list of tag keys to remove from the domain, data source, or application. (string) ---
